reviews.text: I was planning to stay for two nights but left after one. It’s worth another $50 to be somewhere pleasant. So what were my complaints? To start with, there was so much air freshener (probably to cover a vague musty smell) that my nose started to burn immediately, and , the carpet felt strange and had what looked like grease stains - so wore my shoes the whole night. The bed had a plastic-y on it so the matress sort of crunched when you rolled over. Also the remote didn’t work, the rack on the fridge was rusty, and some damage to the wall (I kept thinking fistfight) was patched and covered with mis-matched paint. Though the hotel advertised wireless internet, I could only connect once or twice. The table I was trying to work on wobbled.
reviews.title: NOT worth it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Also the doors open onto exterior walkways, and since my room was in the middle of the second floor all the off-duty BP cleanup workers hanging out in the parking lot were basically harassing me throughout the loooong walk to the room. I didn't even consider using the swimming pool, which is in the middle of the parking lot where all the men were hanging out. I locked the doors and closed the curtains but found myself wondering how secure they were. The next day, when I told a local woman where I had stayed, she made a face and said her daughter had a bad experience there too.
reviews.title: Passible as a budget hotel

reviews.text: Basic stay if you need to really go cheap. Free wifi. Breakfast is very basic and can't compete with business-class hotels. Room was okay, not the cleanest but not dirty. Furniture is basic. No major problems but I think I'd pass on staying here again.
reviews.title: Over priced

reviews.text: Ok, room with so-so breakfast. Front desk staff was efficient. Over priced for what you get and the amount of traffic they had.
reviews.title: Not worth a look. - Yuck

reviews.text: Do not even give this hotel a look. It is old and smelly. Most of the people staying there were scary and the price was way to high. YUCK!
reviews.title: Clean and basic.

likes.disliked: — the area - nothing good to eat (Hooters was terrible) and nothing to do, you just sleep here.

reviews.title: Good breakfast
reviews.text: Very average room. Good breakfast, though.

reviews.title: A good place to stay!
reviews.text: Kind of expensive for the quality of the room. The Hampton Inn is only $20 more, and well worth it.

reviews.title: Would stay again
reviews.text: We drove from FL to CA and stayed at several Comfort Inns and Best Westerns. We found that the Hampton Inns were much better quality and sometimes even cheaper (in some cities), so we ended up booking Hampton Inns for the rest of the trip.

reviews.title: Great oveenight stop.
reviews.text: We were passing through en route to New Orleans. Older hotel. Rooms very clean. Nice linen and nice firm beds. Door jam a bit dated. Small pool but super clean. Good breakfast. Scrambled eggs, boiled eggs, waffle maker even bacon and more. Staff friendly. Some hotels in same exit ten dollars cheaper, but we felt it was well worth the sixty _nine.

reviews.title: Excellent service
reviews.text: Me in my family stayed hear the man at the front desk was so kind even thow we got up a little late for breakfast when we got to the lobby he personally made enough waffle mix for my whole family to have breakfast then he made sure we had whatever we needed to eat a full breakfast I have never been treated so kindly by any hotel like this we were very pleased thanks for making us feel welcomed Mr Forrest

reviews.title: Nice place to stay
reviews.text: The room was very clean and nicely set up. The front desk clerk, Tabitha, was very friendly, helpful and just a delight. House keeping was extremely helpful and had the best disposition. The only complaint I had was the mattress was a bit to firm for my liking..... and that is really not a big deal when you look at the big picture. Very good value for the money. We will definately stay here again.

reviews.title: guest do not come first here
reviews.text: you would think that this being a choice hotel that we would have been treated better didnt happen the first room was dirty coke busted in freezer they moved us but guess what that room was occupied oops so we had to go back to the other room because they didnt have our room type then the next night my 74 year old mother in law had to go to her own room because the ac went out in our room 2am is to late to move kids and all belongings the next day they said ac was fixed when i told front desk is was not she said the headhouse keeper said it was ok now im a liar not good i said please come up to my room and feel how hot it is so after about 20 minutes i went to the desk and they moved us after that our last 2 nights werent that bad the whole stay could have been better please work on your people skills and treat everyone as if they matter to you wont stay here again

reviews.title: great stay
reviews.text: I've stayed here many times on business and always get good service. It's right on the interstate. The rooms are clean and the staff are nice. I like the hot sausage and eggs for breakfast. I'm elite diamond status with choice hotels now and will continue to be so in 2011. The last stay here, I received a complimentary upgrade, my diamond status will bring me more of those. See you next week!
